actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to provide a remedy for sex discrimination by the insurance business with respect to the availability and scope of insurance coverage for women.

summary.text: Makes it unlawful to limit the availability or scope of the insurance coverage normally written with respect to a risk of loss because of the insured's sex. Makes exceptions to such provision for rates based on relevant actuarial data.

titles.title: A bill to provide a remedy for sex discrimination by the insurance business with respect to the availability and scope of insurance coverage for women.
